verbose_text: To further study the effects of the constructed ribozymes on viral gene expression, we examined the mRNA expression of MCMV M36 (an IE gene), major capsid protein (MCP) (an early gene), and gB (a late gene) with northern blot analysis, and the protein expression of viral ie1 (an IE gene), M112 (an early / late gene), and M99 (a late gene) with western blot analysis.
evidence: expression of MCMV M36 (an IE gene), major capsid protein
